reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Project AHANA: Improving access to PPTCT services both in the Public and Private sectors in 14 states across 357 Districts in India

description.narrative: India - HIV - Plan International (India Chapter) - Plan India. This program has the following goals: Achieving zero new infections, zero AIDS-related deaths and zero AIDS related stigma & discrimination. The objectives of this program are: Reduce new infections by 80% by 2024. Ensure 95% of estimated PLHIV know their status by 2024. Ensure ART initiation and retention of 95% PLHIV for sustained viral suppression by 2024. Eliminate mother-to-child transmission of HIV and syphilis by 2020. Eliminate HIV/AIDS related stigma and discrimination by 2020. Facilitate sustainable NACP service delivery by 2024

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for IND-H-PLAN
Percentage of infants born to HIV-positive women receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of HIV-positive pregnant women who received antiretrovirals to reduce the risk of mother-to-child transmission
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Percentage of pregnant women who know their HIV status
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of HIV-exposed infants receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Impact indicator for IND-H-PLAN
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
HIV I-other 1: Percentage of adults (15-49 years) who are HIV infected
HIV incidence among 15-49 age group
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
New HIV infections among children
HIV I-other 2: Estimated number of annual AIDS related death (all ages)
Percentage of people living with HIV
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
Outcome indicator for IND-H-PLAN
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of (estimated) people living with HIV who have been tested HIV-positive
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
